de.feig.FEDM.Core

Class IPortGroup.SerialPortSetting

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.feig.FEDM.Core.IPortGroup.SerialPortSetting
  • Enclosing class:
    IPortGroup

    public static final class IPortGroup.SerialPortSetting
extends java.lang.Object
    class for initializing the serial port with connectCOMM

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      SerialPortSetting(byte busAddress, int baudrate, java.lang.String frame, int charTimeoutMpy, boolean setRtsAndDtrOn)

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • SerialPortSetting

        public SerialPortSetting(byte busAddress,
                         int baudrate,
                         java.lang.String frame,
                         int charTimeoutMpy,
                         boolean setRtsAndDtrOn)
        Constructor for initialization the serial port
        Parameters:
        busAddress - bus address of connected Reader in the range of 0 .. 255.
        Do not use 255, if you want to execute a firmware update.

        baudrate - baudrate of connected Reader. See list of applicable values for baudrate.
        An unspecified value will be ignored and baudrate is set to zero (0). if it is not clear with which baudreate the Reader is configured, set baudrate to zero (0). This starts an internal baudrate detection process.
        List of applicable baudrate values:
        Value Note
        0 baudrate is detected with IPortGroup.findBaudrate()
        4800
        9600
        19200
        38400 factory setting
        57600
        115200
        230400 please check, if your HW and OS does support this baudrate

        frame - frame of connected Reader. See list of applicable value for frame.
        An unspecified value will be ignored and frame is set to "8E1".
        List of applicable frame values:
        Value Note
        "8E1" factory setting
        "8N1"
        "8O1"

        charTimeoutMpy - Multiplier for char timeout in the range of 1..99.
        An unspecified value will be ignored and charTimeoutMpy is set to 1.

        setRtsAndDtrOn - If true, control lines RTS and DTR are set on.
        This parameter should be set only to true, if an external and signal powered TTL-to-RS232 converter is used.
